addLogInfo

protected void addLogInfo(LineBuilder line,
                          WorkResponse workResponse)
Helper to log information about a workResponse.

The default behavior is to write the "toString" form of the Publishable returned in the KeyedWork instance from getWork or the work status name if the response is not of type WorkResponseStatus.WORK.

Extenders should override this for other behavior.

getLastOutputLogLines

public java.lang.String[] getLastOutputLogLines()
If there was already a log file when initialized, get the last line of that file that exists before processing this go'round.

shouldKeepRunning

public java.lang.Long shouldKeepRunning()
Report to the WorkJob whether it should keep running for this workServer.

Note: this is called by the work job in its running loop after the work pool fails to add work from the client. If there is data expected to pass through the client at a later time and/or work from the worker still expected to be completed and served through this workServer, then a non-null result should be returned.

Specified by:
shouldKeepRunning in interface WorkServer
Returns:
null if the WorkJob doesn't need to keep running; otherwise, return the number of milliseconds for the WorkJob to sleep before continuing it's running loop.

setShouldKeepRunning

protected void setShouldKeepRunning(boolean shouldKeepRunning)
